data.message: Please make people you may know an option we can turn off in settings.

replies.message: Hey, Zomby. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo  -Ryan
Thanks Ryan. It's just a lot of the "people" some of my friends "know" look like prostitutes in their profile pics, and it kind of disgusts me.

It also gets tedious as hell when you're just trying to post TO SOMEONE YOU DO KNOW and FB won't pick it up. You type the whole name out, do a chant, slaughter a goat. Nope. Nuttin. But random ones fly up all over when you're posting something random....
